title: A defence of Dr. Tenison's sermon of discretion in giving alms written in a letter to the author of The apology for the pulpits.
author: Tenison, Thomas, 1636-1715.
notes: Appears only as an appendix to Williams, John. An apology for the pulpits : being in answer to a late book, intituled Good advice to the pulpits. London : Printed for Dorman Newman, 1688. It is in the form of a letter to Williams.
This item can also be found following "An apology for the pulpits" (Wing 2681) at reel 951:65.
